### createARMMCSubtargetInfo() {#a5bcf8f0a9452db8ce12b866ceaf53283}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MCSubtargetInfo &#42; llvm::ARM&#95;MC::createARMMCSubtargetInfo (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/triple">Triple</a> &amp; TT, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> CPU, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> FS)</>}>
Create a <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm">ARM</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> instance.

This is exposed so Asm parser, etc. do not need to go through <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/targetregistry">TargetRegistry</a>.
